name: LX Car Parking Sim 18
description:
LX Car Parking Sim 18 is an amazing car parking simulator game that requires highest precision!you to show top skills in steering, acceleration, and obstacle avoidance to get those vehicles parked in parking places. As the parking lot driver, you will drive the awesome cars around corners, obstacles, and parking lot borders with speed and accuracy.
Features:

- 3D car parking simulator
- Realistic and easy controls: steering wheel, acceleration and brake pedals
- Changeable perspectives
- Virtual parking lot environment
- Six stages increasingly difficult to test whether you are a stunt driver
- 90 parking missions in total
- Easy to learn, hard to master
